languages.text: Члены дома Версериан верой и правдой служили династии, обретая все большее могущество. Спустя столетие они наконец стали почитаться наравне с другими знатными домами. Но власть и роскошь способны источить твердость любой породы, и трудно было опознать в пресыщенных и ленивых аристократах потомков грозного сенешаля Версериана.

Members of House Werserian served the dynasty faithfully and loyally, amassing more and more power. A century later, they had finally gained the respect enjoyed by other noble houses. Yet, power and luxury can dull any blade — the now pampered and idle aristocrats were scarcely recognisable as the descendants of the formidable Seneschal Werserian.
languages.original_text: Члены дома Версериан верой и правдой служили династии, обретая все большее могущество. Спустя столетие они наконец стали почитаться наравне с другими знатными домами. Но власть и роскошь способны источить твердость любой породы, и трудно было опознать в пресыщенных и ленивых аристократах потомков грозного сенешаля Версериана.

traits.locale_text: Members of House Werserian served the dynasty faithfully and loyally, amassing more and more power. A century later they finally gained respect on the level with other noble houses. However, power and luxury can grind down the hardness of any stone. One would hardly recognise in the pampered and idle aristocrats the descendants of the formidable Seneschal Werserian.

Members of House Werserian served the dynasty faithfully and loyally, amassing more and more power. A century later they finally gained respect on the level with other noble houses. However, power and luxury can grind down the hardness of any stone. One would hardly recognise in the pampered and idle aristocrats the descendants of the formidable Seneschal Werserian.

Members of House Werserian served the dynasty faithfully and loyally, amassing more and more power. A century later they finally gained the respect enjoyed by other noble houses. Yet, power and luxury can dull any blade — the pampered and idle aristocrats could hardly be recognised as the descendants of the formidable Seneschal Werserian.

Members of House Werserian served the dynasty faithfully and loyally, amassing more and more power. A century later they finally gained the respect enjoyed by other noble houses. Yet, power and luxury can dull any blade — the pampered and idle aristocrats could hardly be recognised as the descendants of the formidable Seneschal Werserian.

Members of House Werserian served the dynasty faithfully and loyally, amassing more and more power. A century later, they had finally gained the respect enjoyed by other noble houses. Yet, power and luxury can dull any blade — the now pampered and idle aristocrats were scarcely recognisable as the descendants of the formidable Seneschal Werserian.

Members of House Werserian served the dynasty faithfully and loyally, amassing more and more power. A century later, they had finally gained the respect enjoyed by other noble houses. Yet, power and luxury can dull any blade — the now pampered and idle aristocrats were scarcely recognisable as the descendants of the formidable Seneschal Werserian.

languages.text: 韦尔森家族的成员忠诚地为王朝服务，积累了越来越多的权力。一个世纪后，他们终于赢得了其他贵族家族所享有的尊重。遗憾的是，权力与奢侈可以磨钝任何刀刃。很难想象，那些娇生惯养、游手好闲的贵族，居然会是令人敬畏的韦尔森总领的后代。
languages.original_text: Members of House Werserian served the dynasty faithfully and loyally, amassing more and more power. A century later, they had finally gained the respect enjoyed by other noble houses. Yet, power and luxury can dull any blade — the now pampered and idle aristocrats were scarcely recognisable as the descendants of the formidable Seneschal Werserian.

traits.locale_text: 韦尔森家族的成员忠诚地为王朝服务，积累了越来越多的权力。一个世纪后，他们终于赢得了其他贵族家族所享有的尊重。遗憾的是，权力与奢侈可以磨钝任何刀刃。很难想象，那些娇生惯养、游手好闲的贵族，居然会是令人敬畏的韦尔森总领的后代。

languages.text: Mitglieder des Hauses Werserian dienten der Dynastie treu und loyal und mehrten dabei zusehends ihre Macht und ihren Einfluss. Ein Jahrhundert später gewannen sie endlich den Respekt, den die anderen Adelshäuser schon längst genossen. Doch Macht und Luxus können jede Klinge stumpf werden lassen. Die verwöhnten und bequemen Aristokraten waren kaum mehr als die Nachfahren des formidablen Truchsesses Werserian zu erkennen.
languages.original_text: Members of House Werserian served the dynasty faithfully and loyally, amassing more and more power. A century later, they had finally gained the respect enjoyed by other noble houses. Yet, power and luxury can dull any blade — the now pampered and idle aristocrats were scarcely recognisable as the descendants of the formidable Seneschal Werserian.

traits.locale_text: Mitglieder des Hauses Werserian dienten der Dynastie treu und loyal und mehrten dabei zusehends ihre Macht und ihren Einfluss. Ein Jahrhundert später gewannen sie endlich den Respekt, den die anderen Adelshäuser schon längst genossen. Doch Macht und Luxus können jede Klinge stumpf werden lassen. Die verwöhnten und bequemen Aristokraten waren kaum mehr als die Nachfahren des formidablen Truchsesses Werserian zu erkennen.

languages.text: Les membres de la maison Werserian continuèrent de servir loyalement la dynastie, lui permettant ainsi de gagner en puissance. Un siècle plus tard, ses membres bénéficièrent enfin du respect accordé aux autres maisons nobles. Mais le pouvoir et le luxe peuvent émousser la plus affûtée des lames, et ces aristocrates ne purent bientôt plus se vanter de posséder la moindre des qualités du formidable sénéchal Werserian.
languages.original_text: Members of House Werserian served the dynasty faithfully and loyally, amassing more and more power. A century later, they had finally gained the respect enjoyed by other noble houses. Yet, power and luxury can dull any blade — the now pampered and idle aristocrats were scarcely recognisable as the descendants of the formidable Seneschal Werserian.

traits.locale_text: Les membres de la maison Werserian continuèrent de servir loyalement la dynastie, lui permettant ainsi de gagner en puissance. Un siècle plus tard, ses membres bénéficièrent enfin du respect accordé aux autres maisons nobles. Mais le pouvoir et le luxe peuvent émousser la plus affûtée des lames, et ces aristocrates ne purent bientôt plus se vanter de posséder la moindre des qualités du formidable sénéchal Werserian.

languages.text: Los miembros de la casa Werserian sirvieron a la dinastía con lealtad mientras acumulaban cada vez más poder. Un siglo después, por fin se habían ganado el respeto del que gozaban las grandes casas nobles. Sin embargo, el poder y el lujo pueden mellar cualquier arma, y así, los aristócratas caprichosos y holgazanes que lo sucedieron apenas podían reconocerse como descendientes del formidable Senescal Werserian.
languages.original_text: Members of House Werserian served the dynasty faithfully and loyally, amassing more and more power. A century later, they had finally gained the respect enjoyed by other noble houses. Yet, power and luxury can dull any blade — the now pampered and idle aristocrats were scarcely recognisable as the descendants of the formidable Seneschal Werserian.

traits.locale_text: Los miembros de la casa Werserian sirvieron a la dinastía con lealtad mientras acumulaban cada vez más poder. Un siglo después, por fin se ganaron el respeto del que gozaban las grandes casas nobles. Sin embargo, el poder y el lujo pueden mellar cualquier arma, y así, los aristócratas caprichosos y holgazanes que lo sucedieron apenas pueden reconocerse como descendientes del formidable Senescal Werserian.

languages.text: ウェルザリアン家の人々は王朝に忠実に仕え、ますます権力を強めていった。1世紀後、彼らはついに他の貴族が享受する尊敬を手に入れた。しかし権力と贅沢はどのような刃物も鈍らせるものだ。今や甘やかされ、怠惰になった貴族たちは、恐るべきヴェルザリアン家令長の子孫とは到底認識できない存在となり果てた。
languages.original_text: Members of House Werserian served the dynasty faithfully and loyally, amassing more and more power. A century later, they had finally gained the respect enjoyed by other noble houses. Yet, power and luxury can dull any blade — the now pampered and idle aristocrats were scarcely recognisable as the descendants of the formidable Seneschal Werserian.

traits.locale_text: ウェルザリアン家の人々は王朝に忠実に仕え、ますます権力を強めていった。1世紀後、彼らはついに他の貴族が享受する尊敬を手に入れた。しかし権力と贅沢はどのような刃物も鈍らせるものだ。今や甘やかされ、怠惰になった貴族たちは、恐るべきヴェルザリアン家令長の子孫とは到底認識できない存在となり果てた。

languages.text: Werserian Hanesi mensupları, hanedanlığa inançla ve sadakatle hizmet edip güçlerini gitgide artırdı. Bir asır sonra nihayet diğer soylu hanelerin saygınlığına onlar da nail oldu. Ancak güç ve lüks, kılıcı körletebilir derler. Şu anki şımarık ve etkisiz aristokratların, kudretli Seneşal Werserian'ın torunları olduğuna kimsecikler inanmaz.
languages.original_text: Members of House Werserian served the dynasty faithfully and loyally, amassing more and more power. A century later, they had finally gained the respect enjoyed by other noble houses. Yet, power and luxury can dull any blade — the now pampered and idle aristocrats were scarcely recognisable as the descendants of the formidable Seneschal Werserian.

traits.locale_text: Werserian Hanesi üyeleri, hanedanlığa inançla ve sadakatle hizmet etti, gücünü giderek daha da artırdı. Yüz yılın ardından nihayet diğer soylu hanelerin sahip olduğu saygıya onlar da nail oldu. Ancak güç ve lüks, kılıcı köreltebilir. Şu anki şımarık ve etkisiz aristokratların, kudretli Seneşal Werserian'ın torunları olduklarına bin şahit ister.
